description: The Bloodfang Lycan King is the apex predator of the lycanthropic lineage. Standing at a towering 12 feet tall, this monstrous werewolf is cloaked in thick, jet-black fur with streaks of crimson that seem to shimmer in the moonlight. Its eyes burn with an eerie red glow, and its fangs are long and razor-sharp, dripping with the cursed blood of its victims. The Bloodfang Lycan King is both a brutal warrior and a cunning tactician, leading packs of lesser werewolves with ruthless efficiency.
damage_resistances: cold, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
lair_type: Deep forests or ancient cursed ruins

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The Bloodfang Lycan King regains 30 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.description: If the Bloodfang Lycan King fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Frightful Presence
traits.description: Each creature of the Lycan King's choice that is within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a DC 22 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.description: The Bloodfang Lycan King can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a dire wolf, or back into its true form.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The Bloodfang Lycan King can make three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (4d10+10) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with lycanthropy.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d8+10) slashing damage.

actions.name: Blood Moon Howl (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The Lycan King lets out a terrifying howl that summons 3d4 werewolves to join the battle. These werewolves obey the Lycan King and take their turns immediately after it.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.description: The Lycan King moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Rend
legendary_actions.description: The Lycan King makes one claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Savage Charge (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.description: The Lycan King moves up to its speed and makes a Bite attack.

lair_actions.name: Summon Pack
lair_actions.description: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the Bloodfang Lycan King can summon 2d4 werewolves, which appear within 60 feet of it and act immediately after it in the initiative order.

regional_effects.name: Cursed Forest
regional_effects.description: Within 6 miles of the Lycan Kingâ€™s lair, the forest becomes unnaturally dark, and the sounds of wolves can be heard howling at all times. Any humanoid that spends at least 1 hour in the region must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or be cursed with lycanthropy.
